name: Water Rescue
description:
--- HISTORY ---

In a sea infested with pirates, it is common for “accidents” to happen. The people from the sunken boats need to be rescued before they die. Take on a rescue team, and save as many people as possible while you run away from the pirates.

--- GAMEPLAY ---

You control a boat. Your objective in Water Rescue is simple: recover as many shipwrecked passengers as possible, while trying to dodge other boats.

If that happens, it will be game over.

--- CONTROLS ---
  • Desktop
    • Key "A": Move left
    • Key "D": Move right
  • Mobile
    • Lean Left: Move left
    • Lean Right: Move Right
